/usr/bin/c++  -L/opt/vc/lib -lbrcmEGL -lbrcmGLESv2 -lbcm_host -lpthread -ljpeg -lshapes -lm -lpng -ljpeg -fpermissive  -lstdc++ -lfreetype -lwiringPi -lbcm_host -lpthread -lcurl  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/infoboard.dir/main.cpp.o  -o infoboard /home/pi/openvg/libshapes.o /home/pi/openvg/oglinit.o widgets/libwidgets.a lib/liblib.a libMAINLIB.a lib/TFont/libTFont.a widgets/libwidgets.a lib/liblib.a lib/TFont/libTFont.a
